verbose_text: Thus, it seems clear that the stimulation of beta2 adrenergic receptors dampens activated M1 (pro inflammatory macrophages) polarization [XREF_BIBR] and promotes induction of M2 anti-inflammatory / regulatory macrophages [XREF_BIBR].
evidence: M1 (pro-inflammatory macrophages) polarization [ XREF_BIBR ] and promotes induction of M2
